title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
**Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch - Style 98B406**

Explore the depths of style and functionality with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch. This sophisticated timepiece, part of the esteemed Marine Star Collection, is specifically designed for the modern man who demands precision, luxury, and durability.

**Key Features:**

- **Model**: 98B406 from the Marine Star Collection
- **Functionality**: 6-hand chronograph movement with a practical calendar feature to keep you on schedule.
- **Case Material**: Crafted with a lustrous gold-tone stainless steel that provides an elegant and durable exterior.
- **Bezel**: A striking black unidirectional timing bezel, detailed with gold-tone accents, allows for easy measurement of elapsed time.
- **Crystal**: The watch face is protected by a domed mineral crystal, offering clear visibility and scratch resistance.
- **Water Resistance**: Designed for adventure, this watch is water-resistant up to 100 meters, making it suitable for swimming and snorkeling.
- **Dial**: A captivating black sunburst dial adorned with gold-tone and silver-tone accents offers a luxurious backdrop for the time display.
- **Luminescence**: Enjoy visibility in low light conditions with hands and markers that glow when the lights go dim.
- **Bracelet**: A gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with uniquely curved and faceted links adds a touch of sophistication to your wrist.
- **Closure**: The sport foldover closure ensures a secure fit for any adventure.

**Advanced Functions:**

- **Chronograph**: Precision timing at your fingertips with a stopwatch function.
- **24-Hour Display**: Keep track of military time or a second time zone with ease.
- **Calendar**: Stay up-to-date with a built-in calendar function.

The Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch combines the functionality needed for an active lifestyle with the elegance desired for every day wear. Whether you're at the office or exploring the great outdoors, this timepiece is sure to make a bold statement. Embrace the perfect blend of form and function with this stunning addition to your collection.

**Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch - Style 98B406**

Elevate your timepiece collection with the sophisticated and sporty elegance of the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch. This exquisite watch is a perfect blend of functionality and luxury, designed to make a statement wherever you go.

- **Collection**: Marine Star

- **Type**: Men's 6-hand chronograph with a convenient calendar function.
- **Case Material**: Durable and stylish gold-tone stainless steel, ensuring longevity and a luxurious feel.
- **Bezel**: A striking black unidirectional timing bezel adorned with gold-tone accents, providing both functionality and a bold visual contrast.
- **Crystal**: Domed mineral crystal offering protection and clear visibility.
- **Water Resistance**: Up to 100 meters (330 feet), suitable for swimming and snorkeling.
- **Dial**: Eye-catching black sunburst dial featuring gold-tone and silver-tone accents, enhancing readability and aesthetic appeal.
- **Luminescence**: Luminous hands and markers for easy reading in low light conditions.
- **Functions**: 
  - **Chronograph**: Precision timing with stopwatch functionality.
  - **24-Hour Display**: Keep track of military time or a second time zone.
  - **Calendar**: Stay up-to-date with a built-in calendar feature.
- **Bracelet Material**: Gold-tone stainless steel bracelet, offering a combination of comfort and luxury.
- **Bracelet Style**: Curved and faceted links that conform elegantly to your wrist.
- **Closure**: Secure sport foldover clasp, ensuring your watch stays put during any activity.

The Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch is more than just a timekeeper; it's a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and a luxurious accessory for the modern man. Whether you're attending a formal event or enjoying a casual day out, this watch will seamlessly complement your style and keep you punctual.

Order now and add this stunning piece of horological art to your collection!
